name: Jungle Hunting And Shooting
description:
A user will be presented a complete live 3d overview of the jungle. Every kind of animals running around in the jungle with the beautiful scenery of mountain, waterfall and grassy outfield will be an amusement.
Hunting in the jungle was never a fun as user will experience after playing this adventurous game.
Equipped with the latest sniper rifle, you will be only require to have patience and accuracy.
Multiple challenging missions. Lion hunting, stag hunting, wolf hunting, bear hunting will be quite challenging if you are not a professional shooter.
So let’s test your sniper shooting skills and get rewards to upgrade your weapons
***Top Game Features***
-Multiple Guns
-Multiple challenging missions
-Wild animals
-Lot of rewards
-Upgraded weapons
-Ultimate hunting experience
-Amazing sound effects
